dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 868 IH: To shorten the review period for the congressional review of termination of certain national emergencies, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gimenez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To shorten the review period for the congressional review of termination of certain national emergencies, and for other purposes.

section.header: Termination review of national emergencies by Congress
section.text: Section 202(b) of the National Emergencies Act (50 U.S.C. 1622(b)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking to consider a vote and inserting to vote; and
by striking whether that emergency shall be terminated and inserting whether such emergency declaration shall continue to be in effect.
